text: \\n\\n[[col:red]]Eating allied units will have diplomatic reprocussions.[[/col]]
Careful not to choke! \\n\\n[[col:red]]You can only eat up to four units at once![[/col]]
Select units on the panel above to prepare a feast for this army.
While this unit exists, this amount will be deducted from this force's [[img:icon_ogr_meat]][[/img]]Meat.
